website_summaries.verdict: An excellent model for using your tablet as a GPS from the driver’s seat, as its powerful suction cup firmly attaches to windshields and dashboard surfaces for instant access.
pros: Suction cup smoothly mounts to dashboard or windshield
Holds a 7 to 10.5 inch sized tablet
cons: Temperature resistant doesn’t mean it is temperature-proof, so it may dislodge under extreme hot or cold weather

customer_reviews.title: Fragile, but best design among many: holds the device, does not squeeze it (so does not leave bottom unsecured)
customer_reviews.text: As some said, this looks fragile, and may easily break. But I bought 2 or 3 to try them out and this is by far the most secure for the ipad: holds it on the bottom and top, instead of the others that have a retractable frame that squeezes the device from the sides. Also, installation is very simple. I don't know why they tell you to put it on the dashboard--it will not work on most, it did not on mine. Plus suction is always best on glass. So I put it on the window and it's great! Not sure how to take it off though, it sticks so well! I will update with use.
customer_reviews.author: DeborahB

customer_reviews.title: It shakes a lot while driving.
customer_reviews.text: As a over the road driver, this works pretty good. Stuck onto my dash with zero issue's and holds my 8 inch tablet for my elogs really well, the bottom side for all who wish to have a steady device with no shaking or vibrating this isn't for you as it bounces everywhere, but I don't mind it because it's simply as I stated for my tablet that I only mess with when I'm not driving to switch duty cycles.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Cadena

customer_reviews.title: easy to get tablet in and out and adjustable for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in bulk for my tractor trailer drivers to hold their tablets while on the road. They do exactly what you need them too. Tablets bouncing in tractor trailers for 10+ hours a day definitely give these mounts a workout. They hold up. They stay where you put them, easy to get tablet in and out and adjustable for pretty much any size tablet. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K

customer_reviews.title: Holds iPad well but only in landscape orientation
customer_reviews.text: This iPad holder worked very well and held my iPad during a 10 off-roading trip. I secured it to the underside of the sunroof glass with no problems. The suction surface is very sticky and conforming and may even hold on a mildly textured surface. The arm is not particularly stout and shook around a little on rough roads but never came loose. My biggest criticism is that it cannot hold the iPad in a portrait orientation which would have allowed it to be dash mounted without blocking the passenger airbag. Never mount any device in front of an airbag.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am changing the review to 1 star, it did not last 3 months. Check the picture out.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the fifth mount I've bought that said it would hold my Samsung Tab 3 tablet. (dash cam/GPS). none of the others even came close despite clearly saying it would fit this tablet. this one fits and it fits very nicely. I haven't mounted it yet but the mount seems to be well made. not the highest quality plastic but you get what you pay for. the knobs and the locks all seem to do the job they were made for. quite sturdy. I'll be mounting this afternoon in low forties temps and rain and see how it does. but so far I am happy and verging on impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Quack

customer_reviews.title: Unstable mount and fell off
customer_reviews.text: Just got to use this a few days ago. As with most suction type mounts, I try it first without any device installed. I installed it on the dashboard with part of the weight on the leaning just on top of the glove compartment. Just today after two days it just fell off. The mount split into two. It can still be used but I would not trust it to keep the 10 inch table it was meant for..
customer_reviews.author: Jay A.

customer_reviews.title: Junk from China is junk in America
customer_reviews.text: My old one that I bought from big lots for five dollars finally broke... So I tried this one out and it was incredibly worse. The suction cup has no power and the arms can only hold an iPad with no protection case. So who wants to take the chance of their $1200 iPad crashing down with no protection? I returned it immediately and used good old American know how to fix my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ebert

customer_reviews.title: Great mount with or without a case
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and liked it so much, I bought 3 more. I bought these for the dash of ambulances. We use ipads for navigation and they sit on the dash and hang down over the front of the dash so they don't block the drivers view. The part that holds the device adjusts enough that we can use it without a case and with a heavy duty case. This is now our go to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Overall, pretty great! Not perfect as it does unattach on occasion but only when it’s not being used - I assume due to the heat build up in the car when sitting in the sun. But has not come off once while driving/using, very stable. Considering it’s holding a heavy tablet compared to a phone holder, this product is amazing - I’ve had many phone holders that won’t stay put and this one’s holding a tablet! Great job!!!
customer_reviews.author: Loves to shop

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last at all, save your money and time.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact that 1 day after installing this product it completely fell off my dash rendering it useless. The suction and adhesive doesn’t work but left a nice ring on my dash. I would not recommend this defective product at all. Save your money and get something that works. I will be.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Seemed very sticky, but fell off every time !!!
customer_reviews.text: This dash mount never really stuck to the plate that was sticking on the dash !! The suction part seemed very sticky and even concerned me if it would ever come off again. But, after sticking it to the dash plate, my phone and the device would simply let loose and fall to the floor. I tried several times but it kept falling off. Yesterday I decided to glue it with 3M 5200 adhesive sealant and this morning it looks as if it will hold for my trip in two days. This caused way too much grief for a simple self sticking device.
customer_reviews.author: Philbert

customer_reviews.title: Worked great through a whole trip.
customer_reviews.text: This held up through an entire trip to and from that was 16 hours and then some each way on a Mazda passenger side dash. Not to sure about the suction since there is a sticky substance like the 3m removable adhesive strips. Adjusted to fit Lenovo Yoga tablet and a Samsung 10" tablet. For those that know how heavy the Samsung tablets are, that's a great hold for this holder.
customer_reviews.author: Rebel C

customer_reviews.title: Great mount, but a tablet with a case will barely fit
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow this thing could stick to anything. It's super sturdy, but the only issue is that with a case on the tablet, it just BARELY holds the tablet. The arms don't really reach out far enough. But once it's in and clamped, it holds well. Haven't tried while moving the vehicle yet. I use this in the back of my 18 wheeler. It doesn't need a mount plate. The suction cup is actually STICKY, so it will hold on to just about anything
customer_reviews.author: Brannigan Carter

customer_reviews.title: Pos dropped my ipad and broke it
customer_reviews.text: Great product if you want to break your tablet. Chinese piece of s*** held for about 5 minutes before dropping my iPad and breaking it. Will never order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: keir rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s doing good considering it’s in my semi and all the rough roads (Indiana) only had it about 3 weeks only came out once I had it sitting vertically and there are no stops on top or bottom would like an easier release feature to remove the tablet but can’t complain for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing! I have stuck it on cabinet in my ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I have stuck it on cabinet in my motorhome to hold my iPad. It shakes a little going down the road but it sticks like glue and has not failed me yet!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet holder for our airplane!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for my husbands Samsung tablet that he uses in the airplane and it works perfectly. We have it on the windshield and it sticks and so far has not come off. It holds the tablet firmly and yet you are able to move it with ease. The price is wonderful and so far it appears that it would be very durable, will update if needed, but I doubt that we will have to. Would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Complete turd
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money. This would be perfect for holding maybe a picture of a tablet. Even then I don't know. I have the lightest tablet you can get and even then the cheap plastic sags and drops under its weight. Just do yourself a favor and order RAM mounts and leave this crap alone.
customer_reviews.author: Vito A.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: I got this tablet holder when I began ridesharing. It has not only made it great to look at the screen and everything is better for me to see, but it has been reliable in every sense of the word. I know that anyone who reads this and takes my recommendation will be more than happy.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Good suction
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this item , the suction is good, the bracket that holds the iPad worm after sometime and the round ball gets very lose and unable to hold the iPad in place swings a lot and keep turning off my radio when driving you will get about a year use then things started falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is a pathetic piece of hardware that is useless for a small tablet. The suction is nonexistent. It will not hold even under its own weight without a tablet. I have tried several positions on the dash and on a smooth surface and it will not hold. I am highly disappointed in this product, unfortunately I threw away the box and can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: I would but it again
customer_reviews.text: fits perfectly my Samsung tablet and my iPad. It seems to be well made, the sticky glue seems to hold it nicely to the dash. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Blaszczyk

customer_reviews.title: Close but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: So i needed a tablet holder for my Toyota FJ Cruiser. A challenge with the FJ is the pod of three gauges on the top center of the dash. That pushes any dash top held devices off center to the left and right. Since I have a phone holder to the right of the pod I needed something to set to the left that could angle so the driver can see but not be too tall. This unit is close filling that need, close but not perfect. I wish the arm was adjustable in length or had another ball joint to allow me to drop the unit lower over the edge of the dash.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Carrier

customer_reviews.title: This works great!
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple of other mounts, but they just didn't do the trick. I am a delivery driver and wanted to use my 10" tablet as my GPS so I need something that will hold tight over the bumps in the roads and highways. This does the trick. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: My Review

customer_reviews.title: Good Product With One Flaw
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good product. As a rideshare driver, I needed a tablet to make it easier to see the maps. This device holds my 8" tablet, and attaches firmly to the windsheild. The only criticism I have is on bumpy roads, I have to readjust the position of the fablet frequently. This is the only flaw I've dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: Catnamedsax

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: It gets two starts because the design is great and it held up for two weeks and then it fell. I tried everything to make it stick again and it just wouldn't. It's really too bad as I liked the design. But it it doesn't stick, it's kinda worthless:(
customer_reviews.author: groovygal

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t hold up very well for me
customer_reviews.text: I had this for about 6 months and then it fell apart. It worked okay until one day It started falling apart... the arms that hold the tablet broke, the suction clasp broke, and tightening knob broke. None of the breakage was the result of a drop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good base only, arm too short.
customer_reviews.text: Base is good and won't come off unlike other cheap dashboard mounts. Unfortunately though, the neck is way too short, i had to Improvise using the neck from my old mount and luckily it worked just fine. Because of that I'm giving it 2 stars. If I can give the base 5 i would but i can't review items like that. My setup is with a base I bought for $4 bucks to not mess up the leather dash with a piece of viynl so it can be easily removed when needed and it stuck on there tight.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge R.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what is meant by “security features” but this stand rocks. It’s very sturdy. Well made. Quality weight and structure. I highly recommend purchasing at this awesome price.
customer_reviews.author: Michel J. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product if you want to keep the windshield area ...
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have said, it does shake and wobble a little bit. but unlock some other products, this one actually stays on the dash and doesnt fall off in high heat or cold. Excellent product if you want to keep the windshield area free of anything blocking your vision.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Good holder for the money
customer_reviews.text: I got this to hold my off roading tablet with Gaia maps and I do wish the arm was a bit longer but it works well in my Jeep JL. Had a bit of trouble getting the tablet to stay but realized you have to ping the clip on it for it to lock.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Pontius

customer_reviews.title: arm connections do not hold
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and how it hold my tablet. But after installing the tablet it kept falling. One of the adjustment areas has teeth to hold the adjustment arms the way you want it to sit in your vehicle. All the teeth stripped out after one trip. I had to superglue the connection so it sits and doesn't fall any longer. The bad thing is that I can no longer use it in another vehicle as it is no longer adjustable. Seems the teeth to hold the adjustment arm need some work.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold a 7" Samsung Galaxy Tab A
customer_reviews.text: Overall a decent mount but it does not hold the 7" Galaxy Tab A like it claims to. It is about a 1/2" too big. So it does not even touch the sides when you put it as small as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Slenk

customer_reviews.title: This is great mount holder
customer_reviews.text: This is great mount holder! I like this holder! I;m working as uber driver I was looking for holder for my tablet. So this was perfectly fits. The section cup is hold well. Good quality and good price. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: alsalami70

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed! Perfect fit for dual screen phone!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my new dual monitor LG G8xThinq phone. Great suction to mount on my dash. Holds the phone firmly and easy to take in and out as needed. Thanks for the quick service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely useful
customer_reviews.text: This think hild My Ipad No problem also works with my windows tablet. Definitely reccomend it for long trips for kids or also to use maps better than the stock maps from the car.
customer_reviews.author: emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Im a truck driver and I recommend it for heavy use
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on my company’s delivery trucks and I get to drive thru unpaved roads which makes the truck jump a lot and having my gps which is a 7 inch tablet/gps on this product and combined with dashboards mounting disks, I can finally have the confortability of knowing my gps won’t fall to the ground of the truck while I’m driving..
customer_reviews.author: Jose Rizo

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit some 7” GPS systems.
customer_reviews.text: Will not fit a Garmin Drivesmart 71EX 7” GPS. It appears to be well made and has plenty of suction and sticksion.
customer_reviews.author: deano

customer_reviews.title: Works great, even on textured dash.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Was worried this might not stick to my textured dash, bot it's still on there good.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lyman

customer_reviews.title: bad suction cup design forget about moving to other vehicles
customer_reviews.text: wont stick on windshield over 12 hours. Pretty soon i doubt that it will stick at all. bad suction cup desiign, my gps cup sticks like glue, if it does fall off, just wet cup and it works like new.
customer_reviews.author: BOTANY99

customer_reviews.title: Needs to have a longer "neck"
customer_reviews.text: It's not going to work for me. The base won't attach to my Dash, and if it's attached to the windshield, it will be too far away for me to easily attach the tablet. It needs to be longer. I'm going to have to return it and keep looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Puppet Lady

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: It's not great looking, it's a pain from time to time as the part that holds the tablet is easy to fall off, but difficult to replace, but none the less it's a relativily relaible tablet holder for your car.
customer_reviews.author: William Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Stays put even on bumpy roads!
customer_reviews.text: Works great bought two. If you have an issue with the suction cup sticking, all you have to do is rinse it with lukewarm water, and voila! (surface has to be clean and leveled of course) Good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Key Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Bought 20, will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 to try out, then 19 more for my fleet of trucks. Sturdy mount that stays on. It has a sticky suction cup that is fantastic. Works great for mounting on top of dash and holding tablet down in front of dash where it doesn’t obstruct vision.
customer_reviews.author: nruss1

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great except for the sticky stuff on the suction cup. It makes it almost impossible to pull it off the windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: One like and one dislike
customer_reviews.text: Like that it holds my iPad steadily and firmly. Don’t like how sticky the base is. If I want to remove it and store it somewhere, everything sticks to it, dirt, dustetc. Do you have solution for that?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mount
customer_reviews.text: I am using it on a jet, and it has a very powerful sticky suction cup! Stays there forever!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly Good!
customer_reviews.text: We received this mount and put it to work on our boat. It mounts our iPad 4 perfectly and holds very well. There is a little vibration movement but not as much as I expected. A good purchase if you are looking for a dash/windshield mount for your iPad or larger iPhone. Very Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M Spellman

customer_reviews.title: Glue suction cup
customer_reviews.text: The suction cup doesn’t really work off of suction. It works off of an adhesive type glue. Once that wears after about 10 uses, it will no longer support itself or an IPad mini.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SUCTION!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the OHLPRO Car Tablet Holder for a road trip from Nashville to Los Angeles. The suction is great on my dash and hasn't come loose once, and my iPad hasn't fallen out of the holder yet. I will say, the tablet holder is very secure! The only part of the product that concerns me is the piece that connects the tablet holder, it's sort of clicks into place, but it's not 100% secure.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: This thing has held up well. I have it ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing has held up well. I have it mounted to the dash of an old semi truck for about 40000 miles so far and it has hung right where I put it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: returned item
customer_reviews.text: wrong size item it was for Ipad, not phone. returned them
customer_reviews.author: lawrence wissner

customer_reviews.title: This does not work for my Surface computer. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This does not work for my Surface computer. I waiting too long to return it so I'm stuck with it. I won't stay stuck...keeps falling down.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, very firm and sturdy. My nephews love it! Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Josue F Silva

customer_reviews.title: Very sticky suction cup!
customer_reviews.text: Very sticky suction cup. Put it where you want it, because it's hard to remove otherwise. I was looking for a semi-permanent installation on my boat, so I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Martin

customer_reviews.title: Keep in mind, it works only in horizontal way for most devices
customer_reviews.text: I using this divice less than month, This mount has some size and wait limitation, it perfectly work with my 8" device
customer_reviews.author: Anatoliy

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: It has flexible positioning so I can move my iPad around as needed. I use the iPad mine for a Navigation tool. All seems to work exactly as it was described.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many other tablet holders but this one seems to be the best so far for the price. I having using several of these holders for 6-8 months with no problems at all
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Great for pilots!
customer_reviews.text: I use it with an Ipad Mini when flying general aviation aircraft and gliders. Works really, really well for that. Holds the Ipad Mini very securely. The suction cup attaches very firmly.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet holder, hands down
customer_reviews.text: I have it mounted on my dash in my KW T680. It's holding an 8 inch Rand McNally tablet GPS. This thing rocks!
customer_reviews.author: GrzzManBill

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Solid
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I use for my tablet 10" and used on an 4x4 vehicle on forest roads. No problems is stays solid. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: eurorom

customer_reviews.title: Very useful product
customer_reviews.text: Holds really well and makes it easier to use a tablet while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: RICK W

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for what I bought it for. It works for the grandkids!!
customer_reviews.author: It's ME

customer_reviews.title: Wow- the suction power!
customer_reviews.text: Plan your placement well. This puppy stuck like cement. Worked great for teenager’s iPad
customer_reviews.author: Phx17

customer_reviews.title: Holds in place
customer_reviews.text: I had droughts but they were quickly gone. It's sturdy and holds my tab s4 perfectly in my rig.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Highly recommend for tablets.
customer_reviews.text: Just used this to hold an 8" tablet in my Jeep on a 2,000 mile trip through the back roads of Utah and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It stays were it is placed. It holds my fire 10 over very bumpy roads. The only problem is the 4 holes that Connect to the base don't lock, so when you remove the device it comes off with it. So I glued it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Buis

customer_reviews.title: SUPER strong suction while holding a tablet!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER STRONG suction!! Hard to get off the window especially if wetting it first!!
customer_reviews.author: GypsyBikerChick

customer_reviews.title: Durable and highly adjustable!
customer_reviews.text: I love how adjustable this is! It has 4 points of adjustment that allow it to work and almost any angle! It is also very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I will be buying more. Suction is top notch the and the device holds the big 12inch iPad for the kids like a champ
customer_reviews.author: doug thornton

customer_reviews.title: Works great as described
customer_reviews.text: It arrived before the anticipated date I was very pleased with that and works great to hold my tablet in the window thank you will order from you guys again
customer_reviews.author: LENELL BLACK

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for what it is. Seems to be built well.Not really a fan of how it holds the tablet. and it doesn't fully rotate. You're much better off to go with a magnetic mount.
customer_reviews.author: Colby Texeira

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: What a great product!! The suction is almost to much!! It’s really hard to pull off.
customer_reviews.author: michaelmary3

customer_reviews.title: Not great on dash.
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay on with an ellipsis 10 on dash after couple hrs. Will try sticking it on a mirror.
customer_reviews.author: ernied

customer_reviews.title: It does the job. But would prefer one that ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. But would prefer one that doesn't extend out as far as this from the suction cup.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tablet holder
customer_reviews.text: I like the tablet holder. It is a little bit bulky but sturdy. Strong enough to carry a tablet. Material is good not cheap. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bayram Suzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice & robust
customer_reviews.text: Quite robust! Surprised me. Clasps my iPad Mini 4 really well.
customer_reviews.author: Hawker404

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stick to my Tacoma dash board, works well when stuck to the windshield, over all great buy
customer_reviews.author: ERIC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: as advertised works great. attaches to the windshield. easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: It works for what I need it to do. Too soon to determine durability.
customer_reviews.text: The product description was incomplete. It did not include specs on the width of the holders. It was difficult to know if my tablet would fit if it was encased in an Otterbox. As you can see I use the tablet in the field on my job so I can operate hands free. Please add this vital datum and redesign the holder to secure a thicker product or product plus encasement.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kurdziel

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: The mount itself is strong however the suction on the mount is terrible. I bought seperate “sticky’s” to use in addition to the suction cup. Also one of the foam pieces fell off I assume from the exposure to the sun.
customer_reviews.author: dina

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not long enough shaft. Too far from me too read iPad.
customer_reviews.author: dennis peevy

customer_reviews.title: Item is good qaulity
customer_reviews.text: Item does the job it is intedid for and will be great to use on our upcoming road trip
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Fit tablet perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Simple, tablet fit perfectly without a lot of fuss. Haven;t traveled with it yet- will know for sure how good it is in a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suction power unmatched.
customer_reviews.text: The suction power on this product is 2nd to none.
customer_reviews.author: Miracle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my LG G Pad X 10.1. glue holds tight
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: well work
customer_reviews.text: we use it in our truck for our drivers and they love it
customer_reviews.author: Nique

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I’m not particularly a fan of this kind of tablet holder because over time, the suction cup will loss its grip, but the suction on this particular product is very strong. It’s easy to adjust and overall it’s an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jagger

customer_reviews.title: It broke after two weekes.
customer_reviews.text: Broke in galf after I had it for two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: mary hancock

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this! It does not stay attached to itself. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT KORB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Suction works great. Very sturdy. Holds its position very well. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: rod offutt

customer_reviews.title: Good product, too secure
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for our tablet. BUT the adhesive used was nearly impossible to get off after our trip.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: This device holds my kindle to my school bus dashboard very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kauai65

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy does not work
customer_reviews.text: Will not hold to window or dash even without the iPad mini
customer_reviews.author: lawrence watson

customer_reviews.title: WOW NICE
customer_reviews.text: Used this in my bunk on our tour bus.... held on the vinyl covered ceiling for the whole 6 weeks until I removed!
customer_reviews.author: vincent jiovino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds to the dash real nice and handles the vibrations. Far better than the overpriced Ram products
customer_reviews.author: seth ludolph

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect and exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Fred M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my job.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my iPad perfectly. Mounts easy and very sturdy. I’m a state trooper and my car goes through a lot. The money stays in place and the iPad doesn’t budge.
customer_reviews.author: Julius Rolland

customer_reviews.title: Works great I'm a truck driver with these rough roads it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great I'm a truck driver with these rough roads it takes a beating daily I use it on a iPad air works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Herman

product_meta.title: OHLPRO Car Tablet Mount Holder,Dash Tablet Holder for Car Windshield Dashboard Universal 360 Degree Rotation for iPad Mini 4/3/2/1Samsung Galaxy Size7/8/9.7/10.5 inch TPU Suction Cup Viscosity Mount
feature_bullets: TABLET CAR MOUNT :can be safely used dashboard or windshield compatibility with 7-10.5 size tablets.Universal for Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 3/ iPad Mini/iPad Air 2 /iPad Air/iPad 4/iPad 3/ iPad 2 iPad Pro,PADs or other tablets firmly ipad car mount.

MULTI-ANGLE ADJUSTMENT：360degree rotating tablet holder for car make your phone to rotate in any position ;the sturdy arm can be 190 degree adjustment, driving without blocking your sight;when on the bumpy roads corners,the device also can be firmly.

MATERIAL CHARACTERISTICS: durable with steel POM plastic material,temperature-resistant TPU sucker,plus one layer of gel integral ,can ensure firm adsorption on the automobile dashboard windshield(Note: It is not suitable for leather surface adsorption)

When driving for traveling outside with your family,safe and secure tablet holder stand safely in front of the car.Powerful gel adheres to most dashboard and windshield;the bottom is easy to clean with water and ordinary air dry ipad holder for car.
